QueryResult.text: SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-48),'YYYY') TREND_YEAR FROM DUAL UNION SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-36),'YYYY') TREND_YEAR FROM DUAL UNION SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-24),'YYYY') TREND_YEAR FROM DUAL UNION SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-12),'YYYY') TREND_YEAR FROM DUAL UNION SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY') TREND_YEAR FROM DUAL UNION SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,12),'YYYY') TREND_YEAR FROM DUAL UNION SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,24),'YYYY') TREND_YEAR FROM DUAL UNION SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,36),'YYYY') TREND_YEAR FROM DUAL UNION SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,48),'YYYY') TREND_YEAR FROM DUAL
